doc:
Bernadette Lafont https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bernadette_Lafont 0 Bernadette Lafont (28 October 1938 – 25 July 2013) was a French actress who appeared in more than 120 feature films. She has been considered "the face of French New Wave". In 1999 she told The New York Times her work was "the motor of my existence". Bernadette_Lafont ( 28_October_1938 – 25_July_2013 ) was a_French_actress who appeared in more_than_120_feature_films . She has_been_considered " the_face of French_New_Wave_" . In 1999 she told The_New_York_Times her_work was " the_motor of my_existence_" .
